title: The Living goddess
creator_credit: Australian Film Commission, Cinetel Productions, Frank Heimans and Josette Heimans
brief_description: Kumari, a virgin girl-child is installed as a deity in Nepal, and wields more power among her people than almost any other living person. Shows ceremonial and religious pageant of her accession in Nepal. Written and narrated by Paul Ricketts.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Film Commission, Cinetel Productions, Frank Heimans and Josette Heimans
